lastfmr
  • Reference

Get a list of the user's friends.

Get a list of the user's friends on Last.fm. Implementation of last.fm's user.getFriends API method (http://www.last.fm/api/show/user.getFriends).

user_getFriends(user, recenttracks = NA, limit = NA, page = NA,
  api_key = lastkey)

Arguments

user

The last.fm username to fetch the friends of.
recenttracks

Whether or not to include information about friends' recent listening in the response.
limit

The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.
page

The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.
api_key

A Last.fm API key.

Value

A list of the user's friends.

Examples

user_getFriends("platyjus")
#> $user
#>            name       realname
#> 1       karawho           Kara
#> 2 PostcardsFrom Alex Frentress
#> 3       lobsana     Anna Moore
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   image
#> 1 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/34s/0f57b9c31a9ff6b6bd31ea9ccc43af47.png, https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/64s/0f57b9c31a9ff6b6bd31ea9ccc43af47.png, https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/174s/0f57b9c31a9ff6b6bd31ea9ccc43af47.png, https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/300x300/0f57b9c31a9ff6b6bd31ea9ccc43af47.png, small, medium, large, extralarge
#> 2 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/34s/5df8b0bdc702487ec845db35f0195ab1.png, https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/64s/5df8b0bdc702487ec845db35f0195ab1.png, https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/174s/5df8b0bdc702487ec845db35f0195ab1.png, https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/300x300/5df8b0bdc702487ec845db35f0195ab1.png, small, medium, large, extralarge
